#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int prime(int n,int p[])
{
	int i,k=0;
	for (i=2;i<=n;i++) p[i]=0;
	i=2;
	while (i<=n)
	{
		if (p[i]==0)
		{
			int j=i+i;
			while (j<=n)
			{
				p[j]=1;
				j+=i;
			}
		}
		i+=1;
	}
}
int main()
{
	int count,max=1000,p[1000],i,j,n,t,ans;
	prime(max,p);
	cin>>t;
	int k=29;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
			ans=0;
			for (j=k;j<=n;j++)
			{
				if (p[j]==0) ans+=j;
			}
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		//	if (ans==228) cout<<i<<endl;
		}
	return 0;
}
